title: PM Modi to dedicate NTPC's 1600MW Lara thermal plant on Saturday
description: No additional land will be required for the expansion. Stage-II will entail an investment of Rs 15,530 crore. Prime Minister Modi will dedicate Stage-I (2x800 MW) of Lara Super Thermal Power Station and lay foundation stone of Stage-II (2x800 MW) through video-conferencing on 24th February, 2024, it stated.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
